mdRecord.dcterms:title: Orthopedic surgical set
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The phrases, "Robt. B & Alex Tunstall" and "bone case" are stamped on the case. The set includes the following items: metacarpal saw, Hey's saw, lion jaw bone holding forceps, curved chisel/gauge, double-sided chisel?, Linston's bone forceps, straight gouge, Hamilton's bone drill, hamilton's bone drill bits (5), curved suture needle.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
